question: You work for a company. You have seen some information online about a training course that would be useful for your work.Write a letter to your manager. In your lettergive details of the coursesay how the course would be usefulexplain how the company could help you do this course.
text: I am writing this letter to seek  permission for attending the AI training course in Mumbai. I have found the details online and I believe, it would be very beneficial for our machine learning project that has been scheduled to start this December.

It is a two-week course and is conducted by Tata Institute, whom we already know is the pioneer in this field. On successful completion, they will be giving a certification with which I can further train our  team members.

During this workshop, I will get the chance to enhance my knowledge of complex algorithms, which we can then apply to the robotics team. Moreover, the automation process can help us to resolve the blockers we are facing due to low manual support.

The enrollment fee is quite high for me, thus, I want to request our company to sponsor this training. In addition, I will be needing an experience certificate and a letter of reference that I need to upload along with my application. Could you please approve and initiate the process of required documentation?
